Create a new API token for a merchant managed by your affiliate account.

Provide the Merchant ID and a Token Name to generate a unique Client ID and Secret for the merchant.

Use the returned credentials to authenticate as the merchant for API operations.

**Note:** This endpoint requires the Bearer token to be an Affiliate (ISV) token. Merchant tokens are not accepted.

get.summary: Calculate Transaction Amount
get.description:
Use the Calculate Transaction Amount endpoint to determine the final amount to be charged to the customer.
This endpoint considers applicable discounts, percentage-off values, tips, and any Zero Cost Processing (ZCP) mode enabled for the merchant account, including Dual Pricing, Cash Discount, or Credit Card Surcharge.
The calculated amount can then be displayed on the payment terminal or POS for customer review before submitting the payment.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Base transaction amount before discounts and fees

parameters.name: surchargeRate
parameters.description: Credit Card Surcharge rate (if applicable) or leave empty to use the default Credit Card Surcharge rate setting in the merchant account

parameters.name: tipAmount
parameters.description: Absolute amount of tip to be added

parameters.name: tipRate
parameters.description: Relative value of tip to be added

parameters.name: useCardPrice
parameters.description: Set to true to calculate transaction amount for card payment, or false for cash or ACH payment

AccountHolderTypeDto.description:
Account holder type

Possible values:

  • 1 - Business: Business
  • 2 - Personal: Personal

AccountTypeDto.description:
Account type

Possible values:

  • 1 - Checking: Checking
  • 2 - Savings: Savings

AchSECCodeDto.description:
Standard Entry Class constant that denotes the way a customer authorized a payment.

Possible values:

  • 1 - Web: Internet-Initiated/Mobile Entries. Default value.
  • 2 - PPD: Prearranged Payment and Deposit Entries.
  • 3 - CCD: Corporate Credit or Debit.
  • 4 - Telephone: Telephone-Initiated Entries.

city.description: Alphanumeric and Special Character | Min Length=6 Max Length=128.

line1.description: Alphanumeric and Special Character |Min Length=6 Max Length=128.

line2.description: Alphanumeric and Special Character |Min Length=6 Max Length=128.

postalCode.description:
Zip code.
Alphanumeric and Special Character |Min Length=2 Max Length=15.

stateName.description: State name, for countries with no predefined states

stateId.description: State id for countries with predefined states

AddressIsvDto.description:
A commonly used address structure.

Not all the fields are used in Tsys,
but, generally ought to be provided.

ApiPermission.description:
Defines the API permissions that can be required for endpoint access. Maps to boolean properties in AffiliateApiPermissionsEntity.

Possible values:

  • 0 - PosStartTransaction:
  • 1 - PosGetTransactions:
  • 2 - PosGetTransactionDetails:
  • 3 - PosCancelTransaction:
  • 4 - PosPrintReceipt:
  • 5 - GetTerminalList:
  • 6 - GetTerminalInformation:
  • 7 - EcommerceAuth:
  • 8 - EcommerceSale:
  • 9 - EcommerceCapture:
  • 10 - EcommerceVoid:
  • 11 - EcommerceRefund:
  • 12 - EcommerceRefundWithoutReference:
  • 13 - AchDebit:
  • 14 - AchCredit:
  • 15 - AchVoid:
  • 16 - AchHold:
  • 17 - AchUnhold:
  • 18 - ListTransactions:
  • 19 - GetTransactionDetails:
  • 20 - CalculateTransactionAmount:
  • 21 - SubmitTipAdjustment:
  • 22 - GetSettlementBatches:
  • 23 - SubmitBatchForSettlement:
  • 24 - SendReceiptBySms:
  • 25 - ListCustomers:
  • 26 - GetCustomerDetails:
  • 27 - ManageCustomers:
  • 28 - HostedInvoices:
  • 29 - HostedQuickPayment:
  • 30 - HostedSubscriptions:
  • 31 - HostedWebComponents:
  • 32 - HostedWooCommerce:
  • 33 - FeatureTapToPayOnMobile:
  • 34 - GeneralPing:
  • 35 - GeneralStatus:
  • 36 - GeneralConfigurations:

percentageOffRate.description: The percent of Amount. to be discounted.

surchargeRate.description: The percent of transaction amount to be added to Amount after PercentageOffRate is applied.

useCardPrice.description:
Parameter is mandatory when merchant has ZeroCostProcessingOption == Dual Pricing. 
Parameter must be null when merchant has other ZeroCostProcessingOption. 
For Dual Pricing, amount should be the card price and useCardPrice should be "true", or amount should be the cash price and useCardPrice should be "false".

accountNumber.description:
The 13-19 digit card number used for the transaction.
This field may contain a token issued against a card number. This is de-tokenized by TransIT to process the transaction.

securityCode.description: The three or four digit security code on the credit card.

expirationMonth.description: The expiration month of the card

expirationYear.description: The expiration year of the card

track1.description: The card data from track 1 of the magnetic stripe.

track2.description: Information stored on the magnetic stripe of a credit or debit card, including the card number, expiration date, and cardholder's name.

emvTags.description: Each tag corresponds to a particular piece of data stored on the card.

emvPaymentAppVersion.description: The version number of the payment application in use.

customerInitiatedTransaction.description:
Customer Initiated Transaction if true
Merchant Initiated Transaction if false
Default value - false.

processedAmount.description: Indicates which amount is authorized. The amount may differ from the amount in the request.

zip.description: The postal (ZIP) code of the address.

countryId.description: The ID of the country associated with the address.

stateId.description: The ID of the state or province, if applicable.

email.description: The email address associated with this contact information.

businessPhoneNumber.description: The business phone number for this contact.

merchantId.description: The ID of the merchant to whom this contact information belongs.

isMainAddress.description: Indicates whether this is the main address for the merchant.

isDefaultAddress.description: Indicates whether this is the default address used for the merchant.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer.

lastName.description: The last name of the customer.

companyName.description: The name of the cardholder's company

ContactInfoIsvDto.description: This group contains fields regarding a customer's contact details such as email id, phone no. etc.

defaultUnitTypeId.description: Sets the default unit type identifier for the category.

CreateCategoryResponseDto.description: Represents the response DTO after creating a category.

useBillingAsShippingAddress.description: Use billing address as shipping address

id.description: Customer Id

CreateInvoiceRequestDto.description: Represents the request DTO for creating an invoice.

CreateInvoiceResponseDto.description: Represents the response DTO for creating an invoice.

posDeviceId.description: External POS Device ID | Mandatory | MaxLength=36

referenceId.description: External Transaction Reference ID | Optional | MaxLength=36

targetTransactionId.description: Transaction Id for Void, Capture, Refund | Conditional

amount.description: Transaction amount | Conditional Required when ```transactionType``` is: 1 - Authorization 2 - Sale 3 - Capture 5 - Refund 7 - RefundWORef 8 - TipAdjustment

useCardPrice.description:
Set the type of price being sent in the ```amount``` parameter. This field is mandatory only if the merchant's ZeroCostProcessingOption is Dual Pricing. For other ZeroCostProcessingOption values, set it as ```null```.


If ZeroCostProcessingOption is Dual Pricing, set ```useCardPrice=true``` if the ```amount``` contains the card price, or ```useCardPrice=false``` if the ```amount``` contains the cash price. The application will automatically calculate the total amounts by each payment method based on these inputs.

currencyId.description: Transaction currency | Conditional Required when ```transactionType``` is: 1 - Authorization 2 - Sale 3 - Capture 5 - Refund 7 - RefundWORef 8 - TipAdjustment

paymentProcessorId.description: Set the Payment Processor ID to be used in the transaction. If not provided, it will use the merchant's default processor.

terminalId.description: Terminal ID related to the terminal that will initiate and handle the transaction. Terminal must be in the semi-integrated mode and available (online and ready)

customerId.description: Optional Customer ID associated with the transaction.

waitForAcceptanceByTerminal.description:
Set the response mode to short or long polling. 


If ```true``` (long polling): HTTP response will be provided once the terminal accepts/declines to initiate the transaction or a timeout happens (terminal does not respond). Follow-up calls to get the POS Transaction By ID should be done to retrieve the latest information of the transaction submission.


If ```false``` (short polling): HTTP response will be returned immediately, while the terminal is still receiving the transaction request. Follow-up calls to get the POS Transaction By ID should be done to retrieve the latest information of the transaction initiation and submission.

requestPaymentMethodStorageConsent.description: Set to true to show popup about saving customer payment method information on the terminal

status.description:
POS Transaction status
- TerminalConnecting = 1
- TransactionProcessing = 2
- DeclinedByProcessor = 3
- CancelByPos = 4
- CancelByTerminal = 5
- Completed = 6
- Error = 7
- Inconsistency = 8
- TerminalOffline = 9

Settlement batch status enumeration

Possible values:

  • 1 - Open: Batch is open and accepting transactions
  • 2 - Settled: Batch has been settled

typeId.description: Identifier for the source type. Indicates the category or classification of the source system.

type.description: Human-readable name or description of the source type (e.g., "Portal", "API", "Integration").

id.description:
Unique identifier of the source entity or system that created the subscription.
This may reference a specific merchant portal, integration, or application instance.

name.description: Display name or description of the source entity (e.g., "Merchant Portal", "API Client", "Third-Party Integration").

id.description: State id

authorizationConsentTimestamp.description:
Timestamp when customer checked the authorization checkbox.
Required for ACH compliance audit logging.

SubmitAchInvoiceRequestDto.description: Represents the request DTO for submitting an ACH invoice.

SubmitAchInvoiceResponseDto.description: Represents the response DTO for submitting an ACH invoice.

SubmitInvoiceRequestDto.description: Represents the request DTO for submitting an invoice.

SubmitInvoiceResponseDto.description: Represents the response DTO for submitting an invoice.

id.description: Unique identifier of the terminated subscription.

statusId.description: Subscription status identifier after termination (typically indicates "Terminated" status).

status.description: Human-readable subscription status name after termination (e.g., "Terminated").

message.description: Additional message or details about the termination result. May contain information about scheduled payments that were cancelled.

TerminateSubscriptionResponseDto.description: Response after terminating a subscription, designed for ISV clients.

TokenTypeDto.description:
Card Token type

Possible values:

  • 1 - Local: Regular
  • 2 - Network: Network

transactionStatus.description:
Transaction status
- Authorized=1
- Captured=2
- Voided=3
- Refunded=4
- Verified=5
- Settled=6
- PartiallyAuthorized=7
- Pending=90
- Declined=91
- Failed=92

transactionType.description:
Transaction Type
- Authorization = 1
- Sale = 2
- Capture = 3
- Void = 4
- Refund = 5
- Verify = 6

name.description: The name of the product. Alphanumeric and Special Characters. Min Length=1, max length=50. Allowed special characters: Space, Slash /, Hyphen -, Comma

code.description: The merchant's assigned unique product identification code. Alphanumeric and Special Characters. Min length=1, max length=20. Allowed special characters: Space, Slash /

unitPrice.description: The product amount. Numeric. Max length=12. Allowed characters: 0-9 .(dot)

measurementUnit.description: The unit of measurement for the product. Alphanumeric and special character Space. Max length=20

quantity.description: The quantity of a product. Decimal number. Max length=12

taxAmount.description: The tax amount established on a product. Numeric. Max length=12. Allowed characters: 0-9 .(dot)

discountRate.description: The discount percentage applied to a product. Corresponds with productDiscountName. This does not impact transaction functionality. It is used for reporting purposes. Numeric. Max Length=4. Allowed range:0.01 to 100

description.description: The description of the product. Alphanumeric and Special Characters. Min length=1, max length=200.

hostResponseCode.description: A two-character response code indicating the status of the authorization request

code.description: High-level operation response - approve, decline or error.

processorResponseCode.description: Processor-specific response code that precisely describes the operation result.

authCode.description: The authorization code received for the transaction.

TransactionTypeDto.description:
Possible values:

  • 1 - Authorization:
  • 2 - Sale:
  • 3 - Capture:
  • 4 - Void:
  • 5 - Refund:
  • 6 - CardAuthentication:
  • 7 - RefundWORef:
  • 8 - TipAdjustment:
  • 11 - AchDebit:
  • 12 - AchRefund:
  • 13 - AchHold:
  • 14 - AchUnHold:
  • 15 - AchCancel:
  • 16 - AchCredit:

TransactionTypeIsvDto.description:
Set the transaction type to be processed by the terminal.

Possible values:

  • 1 - Authorization:
  • 2 - Sale:
  • 3 - Capture:
  • 4 - Void:
  • 5 - Refund:
  • 6 - CardAuthentication:
  • 7 - RefundWORef:
  • 8 - TipAdjustment:
  • 10 - Settle:

name.description: Gets or sets the new name of the category.

defaultUnitTypeId.description: Gets or sets the default unit type identifier for the category, if it needs to be updated.

UpdateCategoryRequestDto.description: Represents the request DTO for updating a category.

useBillingAsShippingAddress.description: Use billing address as shipping address

UpdateInvoiceRequestDto.description: Represents the request DTO for updating an invoice.

UpdateInvoiceStatusRequestDto.description: Represents the request DTO for updating invoice status.

productName.description: Product name of the line item.

sku.description: SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the line item.

unitPrice.description: Unit price of the line item.

taxRate.description: Tax rate for the line item.

UpdateLineItemRequestDto.description: Represents the request DTO for updating a line item.

tags.name: Terminals
tags.description: List of endpoints to interact with terminal(s) from the POS integration perspective.
